mapper.select: select o1.organizationsrid,p1.projectsid,o1.oname,o1.ocode,o1.corporation,o1.register_address,o1.linkman,o1.linkphone,o1.abbreviation,o1.business_address,pt.protypename,o1.poundage from organizations o1,projects p1,protype pt where o1.projectsid=p1.projectsid and pt.protypeid=o1.protypeid
